patthana22.6:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana22.6:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana22.6:3.1_1: adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana22.6:4.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:4.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.6:5.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:6.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana22.6:7.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:8.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana22.6:9.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:10.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:11.1_0: Nakusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana22.6:11.1_1: adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
